Articles.Content:
Alright so, I am trying to load the game and it takes about 30 minutes or something. I would like to make that a lot shorter.

Here's the link to the mod folder:[http://prntscr.com/7hwtin](http://prntscr.com/7hwtin), I also have module manager. If you can find a way to fix this I will be very happy and start working on research and maybe work on my first KSP video. Thank you and have a good day.![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

This may sound obvious but have you defragged your machine? I use Auslogics Disk Defrag as 1, its free and 2, its awesome! 

Also, I suggest using GBoost (google it).

GBoost has allowed me to run the Astronomers Visual Pack. Without it, my system became slow, jerky and, well, useless....sometimes KSP wouldn't load so I know it works.

Probably not the answer your looking for but it will help if only a little.

Don't defrag if you have Kerbal on an SSD.

My game was taking 15 mins to start. However if I disable the net just as its loading it starts in a few seconds. No idea why but it works for me ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

If you disable the Hamachi VPN software on your computer, load times can be greatly reduced without having to disconnect from the internet altogether:

[http://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/2b5lbm/psa_disable_hamachi_to_boost_loading_times/](http://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/2b5lbm/psa_disable_hamachi_to_boost_loading_times/)

Lets just hope the 3 headed demon (Mom) doesn't find out I been messing with the computer just to play some game. So this may be my last post before my death.

- - - Updated - - -

Also will any of these have a chance of breaking anything?

- - - Updated - - -

Ok so, I checked if I have Hamachi but I don't. Any other things that will help me out?

I also have a problem with loading that did not exist yesterday - has there been an update or something? I get to where the bottom yellow progress bar says it's loading the Squad Ion engine, then it hangs up...

--updated--

Folks, I want to leave this one here so you won't refer to me as a Pakled (fix it, it is broke and we cannot go), but I did a little self-diagnosis. I play with about 45 different mods and most recently, added the STX mod. In short, after deleting two part files within the mod that was causing it to hang up as it was loading, I decided to delete the mod. Things are back to normal with the exception of the ability to use the mod. LLL and LLL+ work without issue. 

[See the entire issue described here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24906-LLL-Lack-Luster-Labs-Dev-Thread-LLL-13-1-13DEC2014-SXT-19-07DEC2014-KSC-v3?p=2028871&viewfull=1#post2028871).

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-19T19:28:55Z" title="06/19/2015 07:28  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 19, 2015</time> by adsii1970**
  
Added the information about diagnising STX
Something is happening. My KSP game crashs everytime on load up with mods or not. I tested it everytime. I think its corrupted and its messing with my computer as well.
